title: Why does Mac load so slow??
body:
My Mac can run very high on 60fps but for some reason in the loading screen it takes 10 minutes to load in...

My internet speed: http://www.speedtest.net/result/4260768568.png

replies.body:
That probably means you have a bad internet connection. The load time is not dependent on how fast your computer is, but by how fast your internet speed is.

Only the game resources (like models and textures) are stored locally. The actual game, the actual engine, remains on the server (so that only people won't be in a game where there are multiple versions being executed).

Go to ookla or something and check your net.
